name: Intro to Villainous Thinking
description: Covers basic evil theory, monologue pacing, and villain archetypes. Students begin developing their own evil laugh and a preliminary blueprint for world domination.

name: Doomsday Devices
description: Covers the design, construction, and tasteful unveiling of high-stakes doomsday devices. Learn why the button must always be red, the difference between countdowns and count-ups, and how to stall for time while monologuing.

name: Evil Tech Elective
description: Choose a technology course on designing devices for world domination. Taught by faculty on probation.

name: Mind Control and Psychological Influence
description: Learn how to weaponize subliminal messaging, classic hypnotism, and social influence through the use of TikTok dances.

name: Dramatic Entrances and Exit Strategies
description: Master the art of showing up late, uninvited, and with ominous music. Learn how to escape explosions without looking back, vanish into smoke clouds, and crash events with flair. Capes are optional, but encouraged.

name: Ethics for Supervillains
description: This reflective course tackles the moral dilemmas of modern villainy. Topics include: ethical cloning, humane dungeon design, and the long-term sustainability of global domination. Includes group debates on whether monologuing counts as consent.

name: Platypus self defense
description: You will Learn how to defend yourself against a semi-aquatic egg-layin' mammal of action because they have more than just mad skill, they got a beaver tail and bill. You will learn how to protect the women's ears from their siren song since the women swoon whenever they hear them say...,(*Platypus chatter*). You will also learn how to tell the difference between a platypus whether they are wearing or not wearing a brown fedora
